original_title: Farther and Sun: A Dyslexic Road Trip
overview: Could dyslexia be a gift? Or can it only ever be a disability? Documentary maker Richard Macer sets off on a road trip with his dyslexic son Arthur to find the answer. En route, they meet Richard Branson and Eddie Izzard, and many other successful dyslexic people.  - BBC
title: Farther and Sun: A Dyslexic Road Trip
